-d '{"externalId": "BSS748", "priority": "1", "description": "Managed Security", "category": "TMF resource illustration", "requestedStartDate": "2018-01-15T09:37:40.508Z", "requestedCompletionDate": "2018-01-15T09:37:40.508Z", "@type": "ServiceOrder", "note": [{"id": "1", "author": "Jean Pontus", "date": "2019-04-30T08:13:59.509Z", "text": "This is a TMF product order illustration"}, {"id": "2", "author": "Jean Pontus1", "date": "2019-04-30T08:13:59.509Z", "text": "This is a TMF product order illustration no 2"}], "serviceOrderItem": [{"id": "100", "action": "add", "actionReason":"adding service package OLI", "quantity": 1, "@type": "ServiceOrderItem", "service": {"serviceState": "active", "@type": "CFS", "serviceCharacteristic": [{"name": "CPE Type", "valueType": "string", "value": "Virtual"}, {"name": "Administration Support", "valueType": "string", "value": "Basic( Customer Managed)"}, {"name": "Firewall coverage", "valueType": "string", "value": "Standard(Up to 20 sites)"}, {"name": "Firewall Security", "valueType": "string", "value": "Basic"}], "serviceSpecification": {"id": "f99546ff07266010a7955b7e0ad300a8", "name": "Managed Firewall Service", "internalVersion": "1", "@type": "Managed Firewall Service"}, "serviceRelationship": [{"id": "326d13f45b5620102dff5e92dc81c785", "relationshipType": "Requires"}]}, "place": {"id": "5671dd2ec3a53010188473ce3640dd81", "@type": "Place"}}], "relatedParty": [{"id": "eaf68911c35420105252716b7d40ddde", "name": "Sally Thomas", "@type": "RelatedParty", "@referredType": "CustomerContact"}, {"id": "ffc68911c35420105252716b7d40dd55", "name": "Funco Intl", "@type": "RelatedParty", "@referredType": "Customer"}, {"id": "59f16de1c3b67110ff00ed23a140dd9e", "name": "Funco External", "@type": "RelatedParty", "@referredType": "Consumer"}]}'

api_call: servicenow.post_catalog(customer_id, catalog_id, supplier_id, third_party_import_id, mode, products)

}
]}

api_call: servicenow.post_invoice(mode, currency, customer_id, discounts, invoice_date, invoice_lines, other_charges, order_number, remit_to_address, sales_order_number, shipping, subtotal, supplier_id, supplier_invoice_number, supplier_tax_id, tax, tax_rate, third_party_import_id, total_amount_invoiced)

mode.description: Support for asynchronous and synchronous modes for third-party integration. Default: async

currency.description: Currency for subtotal, tax, and shipping. Required.

invoice_date.description: Date on which the customer was invoiced. Required.

invoice_lines.description: List of objects defining the invoiced lines. Contains invoiced_line_amount, invoiced_quantity, line_number, supplier_invoice_line_number, sales_order_line_number.

other_charges.description: Other additional charges associated to the invoice.

order_number.description: Purchase order number provided by the customer. Required.

remit_to_address.description: Location to which a payment is made. Required.

sales_order_number.description: Number generated by the supplier for this order. Required.

shipping.description: Total shipping cost for the entire purchase. Required.

subtotal.description: Total amount excluding tax and shipping charges. Required.

supplier_id.description: Identifier for the reseller or supplier. Required.

supplier_invoice_number.description: Identification number generated by a supplier for this invoice. Required.

supplier_tax_id.description: Tax identifier associated to the third party reseller.

tax.description: Total amount of taxes billed for the purchase. Required.

tax_rate.description: Tax rate percentage applied for the order.

third_party_import_id.description: Identifier for uniquely identifying a set of imported data.

total_amount_invoiced.description: Total amount to be paid including tax and shipping charges. Required.

functionality: Accepts invoices from third-party providers.
example_code:
curl "https://instance.service-now.com/api/sn_spend_intg/spendint/invoice" \
--request POST \
--header "Accept:application/json" \
--user 'username':'password'
{"root":[{
  "customer_id": "Customer - A",
  "supplier_id": "SUP-123456",
  "third_party_import_id": "undefined",
  "supplier_invoice_number": "QAAP89873220071",
  "supplier_tax_id": "TIN000000",
  "order_number": "POL7987633",
  "sales_order_number": "SO0000000081",
  "invoice_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "subtotal": "6000",
  "tax_rate": "10%",
  "tax": "600",
  "shipping": "120",
  "other_charges": "100",
  "discounts": "200",
  "total_amount_invoiced": "6620",
  "remit_to_address": "1640 Camino Del Rio North #202, San Diego,CA",
  "currency": "USD",
  "invoice_lines": [
    {
      "supplier_invoice_line_number": "QA789A867877ABN32251",
      "line_number": "POL587667",
      "sales_order_line_number": "SOL00000081",
      "invoiced_quantity": "45",
      "invoiced_line_amount": "4000"
    },
    {
      "line_number": "POL587668",

]}

api_call: servicenow.wsd_search_best_match(api_version, best_match_count, end, include_reservable_purposes, include_reservations_within_days, include_standard_services, q, reservable_module, start, time_slot, timezone)

api_version.description: Optional. Version of the endpoint to access, e.g., v1 or v2.

best_match_count.description: Number of best matched reservables to return. Default: 1

end.description: End time for search in UTC or local time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss). Must be later than start.

include_reservable_purposes.description: Whether to return the purpose of each reservable. Default: false

include_reservations_within_days.description: Whether to return all free slots for the whole day. Default: false

include_standard_services.description: Whether to return standard services information. Default: false

q.description: Encoded query to filter search results, specifying building sys_id and optionally floor, area, capacity, etc.

reservable_module.description: Sys_id of the reservable module to include in the search.

start.description: Start time for search in UTC or local time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss). Must be before end.

time_slot.description: Sys_id of a time slot record. Default: None

timezone.description: Preferred time zone, e.g., Europe/Amsterdam. Default: None

functionality: Searches for the best reservable item match based on provided search criteria.

end.description: End time to check for overlapping reservations. Format: YYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

recurring_pattern.description: Details about the recurring pattern for the reservation.

reservable_id.description: Sys_id of the reservable module to check for overlapping reservations.

start.description: Start time to check for overlapping reservations. Format: YYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

user_id.description: Sys_id of the user to check for overlapping reservations.

api_call: servicenow.get_reservable_items(api_version, end, exclude_reservables, ignore_same_day_validation, include_reservable_purposes, include_reservations_within_days, include_standard_services, near_by_location_id, neighborhood, next_item_index, page_size, q, reservable_module, reservation_ids, rsv_path, schedule_view_obj, start, shift, sort_by, timezone)

api_version.description: Version of the endpoint to access, e.g., v1 or v2.

end.description: End time for search in UTC or local time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss).

exclude_reservables.description: Sys_ids of reservables to exclude from search results.

ignore_same_day_validation.description: Whether to ignore date change validation between start and end.

include_reservable_purposes.description: Whether to return the purpose of reserving each reservable.

include_reservations_within_days.description: Whether to return all free slots of available times for each reservable.

include_standard_services.description: Whether to return standard services information.

near_by_location_id.description: Sys_id of location for near_a_person search.

neighborhood.description: Sys_id of neighborhood for neighborhood search.

next_item_index.description: Index of next item to retrieve for pagination.

page_size.description: Maximum number of records to return.

q.description: Encoded query to filter search results.

reservable_module.description: Sys_id of reservable module to include in search.

reservation_ids.description: Comma-separated list of reservation sys_ids for editing.

schedule_view_obj.description: Object with schedule view date and timezone.

start.description: Start time for search in UTC or local time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss).

shift.description: Sys_id of shift to associate with reservation.

sort_by.description: Desired sort order of returned items.

start_date.description: Shift start date and time to include in the encoded query. Format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

end_date.description: Shift end date and time to include in the encoded query. Format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss

api_version.description: Version of the endpoint to access, e.g., v1 or v2. Optional.

recurringPattern.description: Pattern for recurring availability search. Required if startEndDateTimes is not specified.

recurringPattern.duration.description: Length of time for availability. Required.

recurringPattern.options.description: Availability options for the recurring reservation.

recurringPattern.options.count.description: Number of times to repeat the meeting pattern. Required if endDate is not passed.

recurringPattern.options.daysOfWeek.description: Days of the week needed for the reservation. Required if repeats is weekly.

recurringPattern.options.endDate.description: End date and time of the recurrence. Required if count is not passed.

recurringPattern.repeats.description: Repeating pattern for the reservable. Required.

recurringPattern.startDate.description: Start date and time for the recurring pattern. Required.

reservableIds.description: List of sys_ids of reservables to include in the availability score. Required.

reservableType.description: Type of reservable to include in the availability score. Required.

startEndDateTimes.description: List of start and end dates and times to search on. Optional.

startEndDateTimes.end.description: End date and time of the reservable.

startEndDateTimes.start.description: Start date and time of the reservable.

functionality: Returns an availability score for reservable items for specified timeslots.

api_version.description: Optional. Version of the endpoint to access, such as v1 or v2.

shift_id.description: Sys_id of the shift to retrieve the time span for.

attempt_earlier_start.description: Flag indicating whether to set an early start time if the specified start value is within the shift's time span. Default: false

start.description: Required. Date and time of the start of the shift time spans to return. Format: UTC - yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ.

timezone.description: Time zone to use when qualifying the shift time spans. Returns the shift time spans in this time zone. Default: User's timezone

functionality: Returns the shift time span for a specified date/time and shift.
